{{cpp/error/exception/title|operator{{=}}}}
{{cpp/error/exception/navbar}}
{{dcl begin}}
{{dcl rev multi|until1=c++11|dcl1=
exception&amp; operator=( const exception&amp; other ) throw();
|notes2={{mark constexpr since c++26}}
|dcl2=
exception&amp; operator=( const exception&amp; other ) noexcept;
}}
{{dcl end}}

Copy assignment operator. Assigns the contents of {{c|other}}.

If {{c|*this}} and {{c|other}} both have dynamic type {{tt|std::exception}} then {{c|1=std::strcmp(what(), other.what()) == 0}} after assignment.

===Parameters===
{{par begin}}
{{par|other|another exception to assign the contents of}}
{{par end}}

===Defect reports===
{{dr list begin}}
{{dr list item|wg=lwg|dr=471|std=C++98|before=the effects of calling {{lc|what()}} after&lt;br&gt;assignment are implementation-defined|after=required to be the same as the original&lt;br&gt;{{lc|what()}} if the dynamic types are the same}}
{{dr list end}}
